addressText_1: Become a part of {{companyName}}’s team and help us bring transparency and cost-efficiency to thousands of companies from all around the world. All you have to do is to tell your contacts about {{companyName}} and invite them to participate in the crowdsale using the unique link below.
addressText_2: This program is valid for contributions starting from 100 ETH.
addressDetails_1: For more details, please email us directly at
addressDetails_2: using the subject line "{{companyName}}’s Partner Program"
inviteByEmail: You can invite people by email.
deleteEmailTip: Double click on email to delete them
